title: Cedar Breaks National Monument: Historic Visitor Center
body: Historic Visitor Center        Visitor Center    Â    The Visitor Center was constructed in 1937 by the CCC. It was built and designed to resemble the classic National Park Service rustic architecture. The building since its construction has been and continues to be used as the Visitor Center for the monument. It is listed under the National Register of Historic Places. Make sure to stop and check it out during your visit.
